divs: Sighting DetailsI and my son saw 2 lights in the west of san antonio, this was 8:30pm, and I had just put my son to bed.I came out for a smoke and their were two bright lights in the west. dancing all over the western sky and as the one on the right did figure 8's slowly the left just sat and strobed gold and white. then the right discs started circling and spliting into what came to 4 pieces all heading toward San Antonio. I was beside myself. called a few friends all of which thought me mad, and thus contained the story. It was then I sat on the front porch and they played teasingly on the horizon the morning before I knew the truth. P.s. I tried the Cell, And camm, and everything was dead.
trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were no other sightings in San Antonio on or around March 18th 2008
Summary: 2 discs, broke into 6 strobing whitelight, alternating red and blue.
